Class CommonView

java.lang.Object
views.CommonView
public class CommonView extends Object
View class for displaying messages and prompting user input in the console.

      Returns:
      the integer entered by the user

    • promptInt

      public static int promptInt(String message, int min, int max)
      Prompts the user for an integer input within a range.
      Parameters:
      message - the prompt message
      min - the minimum valid value
      max - the maximum valid value
      Returns:
      the valid integer entered by the user

      Displays a menu with a back option.

      options - the list of options
      Returns:

      public static boolean promptYesNo(String message)
      Prompts the user for a Yes/No answer.
      Parameters:
      message - the question to ask
      Returns:
      true if the user answers Yes, false otherwise

    • promptYesNo12

      public static boolean promptYesNo12(String message)
      Prompts the user for a Yes/No answer (accepts 1/0 as well).
      Parameters:
      message - the question to ask
      Returns:
      true if the user answers Yes/1, false otherwise

    • promptDate

      public static LocalDateTime promptDate(String message)
      Prompts the user to enter a date in dd/MM/yyyy format.
      Parameters:
      message - the prompt message
      Returns:
      the parsed LocalDateTime
